content: round slip st into the 3rd chain to close round round 9 half_double_crochet chain 2 does not count half_double_crochet into the same st place 1 half_double_crochet into every st of the round slip st into first st to close round you should still have 48 sts round 10 3 peas in a pod or the granny stitch chain 3 this counts as 1st double_crochet go back into same st and add 2 more double_crochet * skip 2 st 3 double_crochet into next st repeat from * until end of round skip 2 st then slip st into first st to close round round 11 half_double_crochet chain 2 does no count 1 half_double_crochet into same st 1 half_double_crochet into every st of the round slip st into first st to close round round 12 mini windows chain 1 go into same st with a single_crochet chain 1 skip 1 single_crochet in next st * chain 1 skip 1 single_crochet in next st repeat from * until end of the round chain 1 slip st into first st to close round round 13 twins in the windows start by slip stitching into the first chain space window from previous round chain 3 this counts as a double_crochet go back into the window chain space and place 1 double_crochet go to next window and place 2 double_crochet continue in this pattern to the end of the round slip st into the 3rd chain to close round round 14 half_double_crochet chain 2 does no count 1 half_double_crochet into same st 1 half_double_crochet into every st of the round slip st into first st to close round round 15 single_crochet chain 1 does no count 1 single_crochet into same st 1 single_crochet into every st of the round slip st into first st to close round tie off and sew in ends copyright notice copyright © 2025 by juan the yarn addict jtya designs llc all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only
